fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to provide a balance between readability and modern aesthetic.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts have good contrast and legibility, ensuring readability across different screen sizes.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is maintained through font sizes, weights, and styles to guide the reader through the content.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial for headings and UI elements paired with Georgia for body text creates a harmonious contrast.
